meanings.definition: An area of skin that is supplied by a single spinal nerve.
meanings.sent1: The dermatomes on my back felt numb after the injury.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use dermatomes to map out areas of skin for medical purposes.
meanings.sent3: The dermatomes on my arm decided to throw a party without inviting me.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter spread through the room like dermatomes, touching everyone.
meanings.sent5: The dermatomes, like tiny puzzle pieces, fit together to form the map of our skin.

meanings.definition: The distribution of sensory nerves in the skin.
meanings.sent1: The dermatomes in his hand were particularly sensitive to touch.
meanings.sent2: Studying dermatomes helps understand how our skin senses different stimuli.
meanings.sent3: The dermatomes in her feet seemed to have a mind of their own, tickling her unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: His words traveled along my nerves like dermatomes, leaving a tingling sensation.
meanings.sent5: The dermatomes whispered messages of sensation to the brain, like tiny messengers.
